name: timetagger
description: TimeTagger is a self-hosted time tracking app that makes it easy to start, stop, and categorize work sessions. It offers reporting, tags, and flexible views through a responsive browser interface.

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Organize time entries with flexible tags instead of rigid project hierarchies

features.title: Reporting
features.description: Generate reports showing time spent by tag, date range, or custom groupings

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Track time from desktop or mobile devices with a clean, intuitive interface

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Export time tracking data in CSV or other formats for invoicing or analysis
